page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: {Leisure Centre.}On Wednesday 8th May I went to the Woking Leisure Centre, to interview the Deputy Manager. I discovered the following information: The most popular sports are squash and badminton. The age group that uses the Centre the most is the 25-35 years group. Probably women use the Centre more than men, mainly because of the big keep fit classes and aerobics. Roughly 3500 people use the Centre each month. Many famous sportspeople and celebrities have been to the Centre, such as Willie Thorn, Cliff Thorburn, Jimmy White, who are all snooker players. Also the world champion squash player Jahangir Karn and celebrities like Tommy Steel and Jasper Carrot have visited the Centre. The Centre has been the venue for both Britain's and the World's strongest
